prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Guitar, Piano, but without Chromatic Percussion.
captions:

This piece of music features Bass, Drums, Guitar, and Piano, but no Chromatic Percussion.
